Meet Things Go Social!

Things Go Social was founded in 2017 to automate the most painful aspects of factory management driven by one of the most accurate AI platforms in the world. Their goal is to take the factories to era of Factory 5.0 (also known as Black Factory) where most of the work is done by machines without any manual intervention.
